ActJudges Act
SubjectMary A. Mahoney ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Patrick M. Mahoney
PrecisGranting of an annuity to MARY A. MAHONEY widow of the Hon. Patrick M. Mahoney, a Judge of the Federal Court of Canada – Appeal Division, effective June 9, 2012
